skill.name: land-reduction-trespass
skill.description: Clerk for reserve reduction, trespass, survey errors, and railway takings; use when processing the Land_Reduction_Trespass queue.
skill.summary: Clerk for reserve reduction, trespass, survey errors, and railway takings; use when processing the L...
skill.author: ACSKamloops

security_audit.summary: Prompt-only documentation skill containing only AI workflow instructions. The SKILL.md file is a markdown guide with Python code examples for document transcription. No actual executable code, no network calls, no file system access beyond standard AI tool capabilities. Static findings are false positives from markdown code fence language identifiers (powershell, ruby) being misinterpreted as actual script content.

content.value_statement: Process historical documents related to reserve reductions, settler encroachment, and railway takings. The skill ensures legal-grade transcription with metadata extraction, provenance verification, and strict factual-only output standards.
actual_capabilities: Transcribe historical land and trespass documents with legal-grade accuracy
Extract metadata including dates, titles, document IDs, and provenance
Verify document reliability and flag provenance failures
Identify key evidence quotes from source texts
Flag corrupt, irrelevant, or OCR-failed documents for reprocessing
Apply context refresh protocol to prevent AI hallucination
limitations: Requires JSON task input file from refinement_workflow.py
Cannot access source documents directly; processes provided copies only
Cannot modify original source files due to WORM storage compliance
Does not make legal conclusions or provide opinions

use_cases.title: Index colonial documents
use_cases.description: Process batches of historical records about reserve reductions for academic research and land claims.

use_cases.title: Prepare evidence transcripts
use_cases.description: Create verified transcriptions of historical documents for indigenous land claim cases.

use_cases.title: Classify old records
use_cases.description: Sort and categorize historical land survey records by relevance and reliability.

prompt_templates.title: Basic transcription
prompt_templates.prompt: Read the JSON task file for the Land_Reduction_Trespass queue. Extract all metadata, summarize the document, and identify key evidence quotes. Output to the analysis JSON file.

prompt_templates.title: Batch processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Fetch a batch of tasks from the Land_Reduction_Trespass queue. Analyze each document, apply the legal-grade verbatim protocol, and create analysis JSON for the entire batch.

prompt_templates.title: Provenance check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check the provenance field in each task. Flag any documents with Incoming or Unknown provenance. Use the flag-task command with reason Provenance_Failure.

prompt_templates.title: Quality validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Before submitting the analysis JSON, validate: check length exceeds 100 chars, remove forbidden words like suggests or implies, verify all metadata fields are populated correctly.

output_examples.input: Process this batch of land reduction documents
output: â€¢ Batch ID: LR-2024-001 - 12 tasks processed
â€¢ High relevance: 8 documents | Medium: 3 | Low: 1
â€¢ Key finding: 1913 letter documents 20-acre reduction from 1878 survey
â€¢ Flagged: 1 OCR failure, 1 provenance issue
â€¢ Submission ready for ManagerReview queue
â€¢ Document: 1914 Railway Station assessment for Kimball Station
â€¢ Relevance: High - documents Right-of-Way taking from Reserve No. 10
â€¢ Key quote: Railway company paid $200 for 5-acre strip
â€¢ Reliability: Verified - original assessment record

best_practices: Re-read the instruction file after every 5 tasks to prevent context drift
Quote text directly rather than summarizing with opinion words like suggests or implies
Always verify dates are 4-digit years; Unknown is not acceptable metadata
anti_patterns: Using keyword search instead of reading full document context
Writing Python scripts to auto-scan document content instead of manual analysis
Submitting metadata as Unknown when information exists in the source text

faq.question: What input format does this skill require?
faq.answer: JSON task file from the refinement_workflow.py get-task command with Land_Reduction_Trespass theme.

faq.question: How many documents can I process at once?
faq.answer: Each batch contains up to 40,000 characters of aggregated document text in Super Task format.

faq.question: Can this skill access original source files?
faq.answer: No. Source files are in WORM storage; the skill only processes read-only copies.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-only skill with no external network calls or data exfiltration capabilities.

faq.question: What if OCR fails on a document?
faq.answer: Use flag-task with reason OCR_Failure to automatically move the source file to Vision Pipeline.

faq.question: How is this different from general document skills?
faq.answer: This skill follows legal-grade protocols including provenance checks, contradiction logging, and strict factual-only language.
